name: First Adventure of the Achromatopsia Color Blind Cat
name_original: First Adventure of the Achromatopsia Color Blind Cat
description:
The Achromatopsia Color Blind Cat is an adventure visual novel where you play as a Calico Cat who likes to explore unknown places. Finally, one day she receives an invitation from an angry mage to go and explore an old castle where nothing is what it seems!

This game was created as part of my master's thesis in Multimedia Communication at the University of Aveiro in Portugal.

Right now, I am conducting a study about friction in video games and how it can be very positive for both advanced and newer gamers! The participants can be anyone, so if you are interested, you can participate in my study!

All you need to do is play and complete the game (It's not very long, I promise you that) and answer the first questionnaire!

If you want to give me your opinion about the game, see it get improvements, and help me evolve as a Game Developer, the second questionnaire is the right place to be!

It is still in development, so right now is a playable prototype! In the future, I will upgrade a lot of things!

Credits:

- Music and Sound Effects: F3AR LESS or is Patreon

- Chibi Meikura: Ciiipria on Instagram

- Backgrounds: The game, comes with a file with the credits

If you have any questions, please send me a message to my email (vcorreia@ua.pt). I will try to answer and clear your doubts the earlier as possible!

Known Bugs:

- In the button Menu, when you choose the option No, it will freeze the game! I will try to get that corrected as quickly as possible!

Thank you for your support!
